name: Running Gas [BETA]
description:
This was an endless runner project made over the course over 4 weeks in my college.

Controls:

Left and Right arrows to move

Up arrow to boost

How to play:

Your motive is to survive for as long as possible while collecting as many coins. You can boost through blue barrels to break them (which is awarded with points) but the boost meter will run out if its overused, Collect coins in order to charge it up so you have enough fuel to boost.
